itinero-transit documentation landing page

Welcome to the documentation of the itinero transit module.

Itinero-transit is a C# library which solves routing queries over one or more public transport networks - with or without intermodal transfers.

This library is created as part of the Open-Plannerteam-project. The consumed data source are thus Linked Connections(LC).

Documentation structure

The documentation is split in broad parts:

  • Concepts explains the ideas behind the algorithms and the important entities in the code. Reading this part gives an high-level insight in what the library exactly does and is capable of.
  • Using the library shows the nuts and bolts of using the library in your project.
  • The Library reference exposes all the classes and methods - the reference manual to deep dive into the library.
  • Improve this Doc
